getAvatarPostition

public javax.vecmath.Vector3d getAvatarPostition()
Retrieves current coordinates of Avatar. (0,0,0) to (XL,YL,ZL) where L is the limit of space given by the default setting (vars).

Returns:
Vector3d double values of X, Y, and Z position from Origo

getAvatarHeadingYaw

public double getAvatarHeadingYaw()
Retrieves the current yaw heading (space Z-axis angle) of the avatar.

Returns:
double Value between -180.0 and 180.0
